data.title: Get All in One Website Accessibility Add
data.meta_description: Enhance your website accessibility with All in One Accessibility add-on service including white label, live site translation, modify accessibility menu, and more.
data.text:
Accessibility Add-on Services

Manual Accessibility Audit Report

10 Pages / Templates

$2,500

Usually delivered in 7 business days

$7,500

Usually delivered in 14 business days

Usually delivered in 70 business days

All Pages / Templates

All plans include:

WCAG 2.0 / WCAG 2.1 / WCAG 2.2 Level AA conformance testing

Automated, semi-automated testing

Manual testing

Simple before-after UI/UX recommendations on how to fix the issues.

Comprehensive audit report

Two hours of free consultation with our ADA experts to review the audit report and ways to fix the issues.

Multimedia and Documents Audit

Note: Once a purchase is done, to kickstart the audit you need to email us website access credentials at [email protected]

or reach out if you have any questions before making the purchase.

Manual Accessibility Remediation

Enhance website accessibility and inclusivity with our Manual Accessibility Remediation add-on. This service includes fixing accessibility issues and

thorough remediation of your website manually. Our experts ensure accessibility with WCAG standards, improve user experience for those with disabilities,

and provide a detailed report on the improvements made.

Usually delivered in 2 Weeks

PDF/Document Remediation

The PDF / Document Remediation provides a list of inaccessible PDFs and remediated PDFs from where you can request PDF remediation service.

VPAT/ACR Report

The Voluntary Product Accessibility Template (VPAT), also known as an ACR (Accessibility Conformance Report) starts with an audit and provides current

details for an accessible website, application, or any other digital assets.

All plans include: Forms, Videos, Audio & Documents, Dynamic elements

Accessibility Widget Add-ons

$100

Remove the Skynet technologies logo as well as all of the footer links, popups, report a problem link and more for full white label control.

Translate your site into over 140 languages instantly to enhance accessibility for non-native speakers, individuals with language

acquisition difficulties, and those with learning disabilities.

100 Pages

Up to 500k characters

$25/Month

200 Pages

Up to 1 million characters

$50/Month

1000 Pages

Up to 5 million characters

$200/Month

2000 Pages

Up to 10 million characters

$350/Month

$250

Build and fine-tune your widget with the Modify Menu option. Reorder, remove and restructure the widget buttons to fit your users’ specific accessibility needs.

Testimonials

Here’s what our clients think!

App serves its purpose well and has all the accessibility one would need. However, there was one small glitch for which the team was really quick to respond and resolve.

Peelaway

Excellent App! Great for all size stores. Easy to install. I needed something that offers global compliance at a reasonable price for large stores. It meets all my needs.

Omnilux

All in One Accessibility™ has been great. They were very helpful when I had questions about setting up the app. They emailed me making sure that I was completely satisfied.

Ambiance

Receive up to $5,000 in Tax Credit with All in One Accessibility

Businesses that are making efforts to increase accessibility for people with disabilities can receive up to $5,000 in tax credits!!!

Our partners get white label and custom branding addons free for all plans!

Are you a web design, development, or marketing agency? A freelancer? If you manage or market your clients' websites and directly influence the websites of businesses, you get more with no extra fees!

FAQs

To remove the branding, you can acquire the white label service from All in One Accessibility dashboard by following steps:

Log in to your account at https://ada.skynettechnologies.us/front/.

Navigate to add-ons and upgrades.

Activate the white label service.

Note: After enabling the service, it is necessary to clear the browser cache or check it using a private browser.

Yes, Free custom branding is available for agency partners only. Apply for it from here.

The Live Site Translation add-on supports over 140 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, and many more ensuring inclusivity for diverse audiences.

Yes, Purchase "Modify Accessibility Menu" add-on to reorder, remove, and restructure the widget buttons to fit your specific accessibility needs.

Yes, we provide PDF / document remediation in 140+ languages.

Accessibility widget bundle includes All in One Accessibility widget, modify accessibility menu add-on, live site translations add-on, and white label subscription add-on.

Add Ons work only on paid plan, so you must buy a paid version.

The All in One Accessibility Live Site Translation add-on facilitates multilingual accessibility by automatically translating website content into various languages in real-time. Users can either select their preferred language manually or widget detects their default website language for seamless translation, ensuring that the website is accessible to individuals who speak different languages.

It will just take a couple of minutes after installation of All in One Accessibility. To activate the language translation add-on:

Log in to your account at https://ada.skynettechnologies.us/front/.

Navigate to add-ons and upgrades.

Select the suitable live site translation plan and buy it.

Reordering, removing, restructuring, and customizing the accessibility menu is straightforward and intuitive, with user-friendly options and settings available within the All in One Accessibility dashboard.

Yes, it is designed to work with various types of PDF files, including those created from scanned documents, digital publications, and interactive forms, ensuring comprehensive accessibility coverage.

For support or assistance with All in One Accessibility add-ons, you can typically find resources such as FAQs, knowledge base, and email at [email protected].
